form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sandersintroduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend to all veterans with a serious service-connected injury eligibility to participate in the family caregiver services program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Caregivers Expansion and Improvement Act of 2013 .

section.header: Extension to all veterans with a serious service-connected disability of eligibility for participation in family caregiver program
section.text: Section 1720G(a)(2)(B)of title 38, United States Code, is amended by strikingon or after September 11, 2001.
